articles.description: The San Jose Sharks are bringing back Luke Kunin and Kaapo Kahkonen with almost-identical contracts. Per Puckpedia, RFA winger Kunin has re-signed for two years with a $2.75 million dollar AAV. Per Elliotte Friedman, RFA goalie Kahkonen has re-signed for two …
articles.content:
